Body: I just bought a new d2 Tablet, and it seems to be functioning normally, except that the Wi-Fi will not turn on.  I navigated to the settings screen and selected Wi-Fi, and dragged the Off button to On.  It stayed at On  and displayed the text "Turning Wi-Fi on..." for five seconds, after which it turned the button back to Off.  It has done this repeatedly.  I know I have good wireless signal b/c I'm using it to submit this question from my laptop. Is there some additional diagnostic I can do, or do I need to see about returning it as defective?
Title: How to Diagnose Wireless that won't turn on?

history.Text: I just bought a new [d2 Tablet][1], and it seems to be functioning normally, except that the Wi-Fi will not turn on.  I navigated to the settings screen and selected Wi-Fi, and dragged the `Off` button to `On`.  It stayed at `On`  and displayed the text "Turning Wi-Fi on..." for five seconds, after which it turned the button back to `Off`.  It has done this repeatedly.  I know I have good wireless signal b/c I'm using it to submit this question from my laptop. Is there some additional diagnostic I can do, or do I need to see about returning it as defective?  [1]: http://d2pad.info/index.php?option=com_content&view=frontpage&Itemid=203
How to Diagnose Wireless that won't turn on?
